intro.title: Software Development Portfolio
intro.subtitle: Each project in this portfolio reflects a professional, results-oriented approach.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Functional and optimized solutions. I focus on code architecture, performance, and scalability, aiming for solid and maintainable development.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to TomiNavel. By accessing this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

intellectual.title: 1. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this site, including text, images, code, and other elements, is the property of TomiNavel unless otherwise stated. Unauthorized use is not allowed.

usage.title: 2. Site Usage
usage.content: The content of this portfolio is for informational and demonstration purposes only. Accuracy or availability at all times is not guaranteed.

liability.title: 3. Liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for the misuse of the site's content or for any damages resulting from access or use of the information contained herein.

cookies.title: 4. Cookies and Privacy
cookies.content: This site may use cookies to enhance user experience. You can manage cookies in your browser settings.

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Updates will be published on this page.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, you can contact us through the Contact section.

cookies.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. See our

intro.part2: we use cookies to enhance user experience. By continuing to browse our site, you agree to the use of cookies according to this policy.

section1.title: 1. What are cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to remember preferences, improve navigation, and gather statistics about usage.

section2.title: 2. What types of cookies do we use?
section2.essentialText: Required for the basic operation of the site.
section2.analyticsText: Help us understand how users interact with the site (Google Analytics, etc.).

section3.title: 3. How to manage cookies?
section3.content: You can configure your browser to accept, reject, or delete cookies. Here are some useful links:

section4.title: 4. Changes to this policy
section4.content: We reserve the right to update this policy at any time.
